thread.section_title: MyUS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyUS.com | myus2.myus.com
thread.title: Warren

author: Warren
title: Warren
text:
I have been using MyUS.com for several years now. The service is very reliable and has the following advantages:
* It allows me to take advantage of offers when the merchant doesn't ship to my part of the world.
* It allows me to consolidate purchases from various merchants into a single consignment for international shipping (which is especially valuable when the merchants offer free shipping within the US).
* When merchants won't accept non-US credit cards, they will purchase on my behalf.
I have never had any problems in dealing with MyUS.com, and I have never lost a consignment.
